seriesJson.title: House hearings on public broadcasting
seriesJson.description: A report on the House Commerce Committee hearings on the Public Broadcasting Act of 1967.

node.title: Public Broadcasting Act of 1967, part two
node.description: This program presents the second part of a report on the House Commerce Committee hearings on the Public Broadcasting Act of 1967.

node.title: Public Broadcasting Act of 1967, part one
node.description: This program presents the first part of a report on the House Commerce Committee hearings on the Public Broadcasting Act of 1967. Includes an interview with John Gardner, Secretary of Health, Education and Welfare.
